meanings.definition: A piece of fiction written by a fan of a particular TV show, movie, book, etc., using existing characters and settings.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading fanfic stories about my favorite characters.
meanings.sent2: She spends her free time writing fanfic based on popular movies.
meanings.sent3: The fanfic she wrote about the magical school was both creative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His fanfic painted a vivid picture of the characters' adventures beyond the original story.
meanings.sent5: The fanfic brought new life to the familiar characters, making them feel real and relatable.

meanings.definition: The activity or practice of writing fan fiction.
meanings.sent1: Fanfic writing allows fans to explore their creativity in new ways.
meanings.sent2: Many fans participate in fanfic as a form of expression and enjoyment.
meanings.sent3: The fanfic club at school always has interesting discussions about their stories.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fanfic showed her passion for storytelling outside the original plot.
meanings.sent5: Engaging in fanfic writing can be a fun and imaginative hobby for enthusiasts.
